sections.title: interests
sections.content: Originally from New Zealand; interested in the aesthetics and politics of computing infrastructure, computer history, and other ways of thinking computing critically. I run a [bi-weekly technology studies reading group](https://argnotes.club/) in London. I have a [debut solo EP](https://open.spotify.com/album/4QArUFWoCa3NHP70W3dOEI) on Spotify 2016; [Princeton Footnotes](http://princetonfootnotes.com/) 2013-18; music director/actor in Princeton musicals 2013-2018; writer for the [Triangle Show](http://www.triangleshow.com/) 2013-2018; NZ Waterpolo representative 2012, Princeton Men's WP 2014.

body.title: Forensic Architecture: software lead
body.content: I direct engineering for several full stack platforms and machine learning workflows. I also sit on our data management committee for digital security, and offer expertise across investigations that are computer oriented. See forensic-architecture.org for more information.

body.title: DirectDrinks: CTO and co-founder
body.content: We provide a direct sales channels between large corporate suppliers and small resellers in the FMCG industry, disrupting a pipeline that is currently dominated by mid-tier redistributors. Digital platform for web, mobile, and tablet: directdrinks.com.au.

body.title: Inflection: mobile developer
body.content: Developed an Objective C SDK for an OAuth2 verification flow, and prototyped two React Native applications. Contributions to Dockerized Rails backend.

body.title: Artirigo AG: full stack developer
body.content: React Native frontend for iOS and Android. In addition, Dockerized and contributions to Rails application.

body.title: Princeton University
body.content: Major in Computer Science. Classes also in intellectual history, media and cultural theory, performance theory, theatre et al.

sections.title: portfolio | references
sections.content: For code see [lachlankermode.com/portfolio](http://lachlankermode.com/portfolio), contributions on GitHub [@breezykermo](https://github.com/breezykermo). Twitter [@lachlankermode](https://www.twitter.com/lachlankermode). Visit [lachlankermode.com/resume](http://lachlankermode.com/resume) for active links in this resume. References available on request.
